formatted_address: 50 G, Jalan Eko Botani 3/2, Taman Eko Botani, 79100 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: ZUS Coffee - Eco Botanic, Johor

reviews.text: Encounter 2 times CEO Latte half cup only. My order is pick up 1 Hot Americano and 1 Extra Hot CEO Latte, outside is raining, I request for carrier, they only provide paper bag without handle. What if spilt out? Very cold service

2025 May.    Still great coffee.    Despite occasional very long queue.    Jason a great guy.   Unflappably consistent despite queue.  Consistent Excellent coffee.  Wife's pilates class is upstairs - so Zus is a 2x week experience.   Always great coffee. Complimentary hot water.  Strong wifi.   Worthy of 5 stars.. Just kill the very irritating music jingle.   Clean toilets.  Clean tables.

Reasonable price,Large cups of beverages compare to other coffee competitors.
Friendly staff welcomes and greet with a smile.Multiracial staffs.

Suggestion to owner:if can place a partition to the restroom entrance as it can be seen directly from the dinerâ€™s table.

I find the Spanish Latte very sweet in a good way

Never know much about this Cafe, but i love the atmosphere and the design

Submitted an order for pickup and despite no customers or other pending orders, the wait is long and about 15 minutes.

There are workers around but they are just doing their own things and couldn't be bothered with the order.

vicinity: 50 G, Jalan Eko Botani 3/2, Taman Eko Botani, Iskandar Puteri
